items.text: Since the version of Retrofit 2.6.0, you can get the annotations in OkHttp Interceptor using the tag field like this:
items.href: android - Retrofit 2 : Custom annotations for custom interceptor - Stack Overflow

items.text: Then inside of the interceptor, you can verify if the request is annotated or no.
